name: com.malanek.serializedcollections
description: Serialized Dictionary and Array2D for Unity inspector! Plus additional Inspector Extensions to enhance your workflow.

additionalInfo.supportContact: For any questions or issues, contact mateusz.malanowski@bugbomb.com

features.Array2D<T>: Allows the creation and management of 2D arrays directly in the Unity inspector, providing a more intuitive way to work with grid-based data.
features.SerializedDictionary<TKey, TValue>: Enables the serialization of dictionaries in Unity's inspector, offering a more robust alternative to the standard lists and arrays.
features.[Radio]: A custom attribute that ensures only one boolean value can be true within a group of bool fields, mimicking a radio button behavior in the inspector.
features.[FolderPath]: Adds a button in the inspector that allows for easy selection of a folder path, streamlining the process of setting up file paths.
features.[ExpandRef]: Allows you to expand and view the referenced object directly in the inspector, making it easier to manage complex references without leaving the current context.
